# ITSMe

The goal of the ITSMe package is to provide easy to use functions to quickly 
obtain structural metrics from tree point clouds and their respective TreeQSMs 
obtained with version 2.4.0 of TreeQSM 
(https://github.com/InverseTampere/TreeQSM).

## Installation

You can install the development version of ITSMe from 
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("lmterryn/ITSMe")
```
